full_text: Page 395 >>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 9:42 AM >>> Thanks. Where and with who will he be housed after his Attorney visit? Also, what does "Psychology Observation" status mean? J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521- >>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 9:39 AM >>> Hello, Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney. I will provide you with information concerning the medical assessment, once I receive it. Thanks. Shirley Skipper-Scott Associate Warden MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Office: 646-836- Black Berry: 646-423- @bop.gov >>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 8:45 AM >>> Shirley - Please provide me with a daily update on this inmate, including his status and any changes/activities I should be aware of. Thanks! J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521- Page 1086 DOJ-OGR-00024892

text_blocks.content: >>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 9:42 AM >>> Thanks. Where and with who will he be housed after his Attorney visit? Also, what does "Psychology Observation" status mean?
J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521-

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 9:39 AM >>> Hello, Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney. I will provide you with information concerning the medical assessment, once I receive it. Thanks.
Shirley Skipper-Scott Associate Warden MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Office: 646-836- Black Berry: 646-423- @bop.gov
>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 8:45 AM >>> Shirley - Please provide me with a daily update on this inmate, including his status and any changes/activities I should be aware of. Thanks!
J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521-

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing the status of inmate Epstein. The emails are redacted, with some phone numbers and email addresses obscured.
